mapper.select: select 'user-' || max(to_number(user_id)) as businessId from sys_user union all select 'role-' || max(to_number(role_id)) as businessId from sys_role union all select 'userRole-' || max(to_number(user_role_id)) as businessId from sys_user_role union all select 'income-' || max(to_number(income_id)) as businessId from sys_income union all select 'notice-' || max(to_number(notice_id)) as businessId from sys_notice
